newsitem.title: USA: Ancor gets $1.7 mln Japanese switch order.
newsitem.headline: Ancor gets $1.7 mln Japanese switch order.

text.p: Ancor Communications Inc said Wednesday it has received a $1.7 million order from Hucom Inc, its Japanese distributor, as part of a $7.4 million project to provide switches and network interface products for a new design and engineering facility being built for a Japanese manufacturer.

The initial order is expected to be shipped in the fourth quarter, with three more orders expected to be shipped in the 1997 first quarter, Ancor said. The company reported a total of $4.7 million in sales in 1995.
